definition: abbr. for 揚州|扬州[Yang2 zhou1]/surname Yang
to raise/to hoist/the action of tossing or winnowing/scattering (in the wind)/to flutter/to propagate
sail/Taiwan pr. [fan2], except 帆布[fan1 bu4] canvas
to set sail on a voyage to a distant place/(fig.) to undertake a great mission

sentences.english: The sea in the sails, call your motivate you struggled to climb the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 大海在召喚你揚帆遠航，高山在激勵你奮力攀登。

sentences.english: A time to rassie the sails of your own beliefs.
sentences.chinese: 一個爲你的的信仰而揚帆的的時機。

sentences.english: The captain ordered the crew to square away and sail before the wind.
sentences.chinese: 船長命令水手迎風揚帆，乘風行駛。

sentences.english: The sailor must unfurl the sails, but it's the wind that moves the ship.
sentences.chinese: 水手必須揚帆衝浪，但令船航行的，卻是風。

sentences.english: A time to rassie the sails of your own beliefs.
sentences.chinese: 一個爲你的信仰而揚帆的時機。

sentences.english: Bound for the prize of (all too precious) you.
sentences.chinese: 揚帆直駛去奪取太寶貴的你。

sentences.english: I hope we set our sails and venture out one day. That will be one glorious day… (8-22-2010)
sentences.chinese: 我希望有天我們能揚帆啓程去冒險。

sentences.english: As long as you sail, there will Bamianlaifeng.
sentences.chinese: 只要你揚帆，便會有八面來風。

sentences.english: Take away my golden paddy when you sail.
sentences.chinese: 再揚帆時帶走我金色的稻穀。

sentences.english: Even as We sail and sail, We are a still picture.
sentences.chinese: 即使在我們啓航，揚帆遠航，我們是一個靜止圖像。

sentences.english: Mid-2001 exam, our school won the urban areas, students sail Kaozhuang Yuan.
sentences.chinese: 2001年中考，我校揚帆同學奪得了市區中考狀元。

sentences.english: It seemed to sail on waves of air, just like a sailboat on ocean waves.
sentences.chinese: 它似乎在氣浪上揚帆航行，就像海浪上的一艘帆船。

sentences.english: No matter how many hardness and misery, we also can , set sail far away.
sentences.chinese: 就算有太多，艱辛苦難，我們也能，遠航揚帆。

sentences.english: To sail the Zhuo, Zhuo in the dream of sailing.
sentences.chinese: 希望在濯中揚帆，夢想在濯中起航。

sentences.english: Aguilar - with you in setting up accelerated, will be able to reach a successful side.
sentences.chinese: 立帆達瓷業與你攜手揚帆，定能到達成功彼岸。

sentences.english: Have tough-minded boy only, ability appeases billows, hoist the sails Yuan Hang.
sentences.chinese: 只有意志堅強的小夥子，才能平息波瀾，揚帆遠航。

definition: fire beacon (used as alarm signal over long distance)
to travel a great distance by sea or air/voyage/long-haul flight
Wanli township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
the bow or prow of a ship
to brave the wind and the billows (idiom); to have high ambitions
legendary dragon with the ability to control rain and floods
to turn over/to surge/to churn/to rummage/raging (torrent)
